thread.section_title: Park South Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel - Review of Park South Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: myungah2017
title: Excellent hotel
text: This hotel is a hidden gem. 100% recommendation to anyone. Excellent! The staffs and service was amazing and the room was very spacious. The location was fantastic! The restaurant was really good too at the hotel site. I used the computer and printer for any additional charge and they even allowed me to get the late checkout. To me it was a five star hotel!
